meanings.definition: The act of shopping at a mall.
meanings.sent1: After school, we went malling for new shoes.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys malling on weekends to buy clothes.
meanings.sent3: The family made a fun day out of malling for gifts.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for malling is like a treasure hunt for bargains.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of malling filled the air with anticipation.

meanings.definition: The process of converting an area into a mall.
meanings.sent1: The malling of the old warehouse turned it into a bustling shopping center.
meanings.sent2: City planners discussed the malling of the vacant lot.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated the completion of the malling project.
meanings.sent4: The malling of the neighborhood brought in new businesses.
meanings.sent5: The malling of the space transformed it into a hub of activity.

meanings.definition: The act of hanging out at a mall.
meanings.sent1: On weekends, they enjoy malling with friends.
meanings.sent2: She finds malling a relaxing way to spend time.
meanings.sent3: The group's favorite pastime is malling and people-watching.
meanings.sent4: Malling with friends is like a mini adventure every time.
meanings.sent5: The joy of malling together created lasting memories.
